var a = {
  method1: function() {
    return "a1";
  }
};

var b = {
  __proto__: a,
  method2: function() {
    return "b1";
  }
};

var c = {
  __proto__: b,
  method3: function() {
    return "c3";
  }
};

a.method1();
c.method1();
